  • Constructor Details

    • House

      public House​(java.lang.String addr, int bedrooms, int bathrooms, int receptionRooms, boolean hasGarage)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      addr - the address of the house
      bedrooms - the number of bedrooms within the house.
      bathrooms - the number of bathrooms within the house.
      receptionRooms - the number of reception rooms within the house.
      hasGarage - a flag indicating whether the house has a garage.
